product_name: GSI Outdoors Booster Salt and Pepper Shaker
long_description: Compact and waterproof, this twin-chambered shaker lets you bring along salt and pepper, or any other 2 spices, on your backcountry excursions to reveal the full flavor of a gourmet meal.
short_description: Compact and waterproof, this twin-chambered shaker lets you bring along salt and pepper, or any other 2 spices, on your backcountry excursions to reveal the full flavor of a gourmet meal.
